situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The akita builds a power plant near the green fields of the crow. The akita builds a power plant near the green fields of the gadwall. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: If there is evidence that one animal, no matter which one, hugs the leopard, then the monkey dances with the dachshund undoubtedly. Rule2: If you see that something builds a power plant close to the green fields of the crow and builds a power plant close to the green fields of the gadwall, what can you certainly conclude? question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the monkey dance with the dachshund?
